alert.note: Alert for Hale; Perry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 4:08PM CDT until June 25 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Perry County in central Alabama... Southeastern Hale County in west central Alabama... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 408 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Newbern, or 8 miles southeast of Greensboro, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Greensboro, Uniontown, Newbern and Laneville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
